Text:
function RIR_EP04_12()
    -- .承-2【11月第4週】「影の共学派の実力」
    SaveData.Title = "影の共学派の実力"

    -- //BG：メインストリート（冬）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav")

    MSG([[ The next day, when I went to school as usual, for some reason the campus was noisy. ]])

    MSG([[ When I entered the school building, I couldn't help but guess the cause of the commotion. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002",1000,false)

    -- //BG：1Ｆ廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1442.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-what? The Princess Election between me and Daria-san has been decided…!? What does this mean!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It seemed that a poster announcing the decision to hold a 'Princess Election' between me and Daria-san was posted on the school bulletin board. ]])

    MSG([[ The stated reason for the election was "to decide who is more suitable to be Hermes-san's dance partner at the year-end Holy Night Festival," something I was learning about for the first time. ]])

    MSG([[ Completely unexpected, I just froze. ]])

    -- //BU：ダリア（笑顔）、モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0366.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "So the star of the show has finally arrived. You were late, Erika-kun." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1443.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Daria-san…! What is the meaning of this!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Daria-san appeared before me, accompanied by her ‘knights’. ]])

    MSG([[ Her usual calm expression, but right now I felt nothing but malice. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0367.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Hey, hey, what are you talking about? Didn’t we decide this yesterday after talking it over?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0368.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "We just want to fairly decide who is the more suitable partner for Hermes." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1444.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-I never heard any such talk!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0369.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "That’s quite sad. You hate Hermes that much, don’t you... I heard you even turned down her invitation for a date." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1445.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-well, that’s—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Daria-san’s knights glared sharply at me. ]])

    MSG([[ Their eyes were completely that of sworn enemies. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia-knight_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria’s Knight】
 "You don’t want to be paired with Lady Hermes that badly? Who do you think you are?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia-knight_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria’s Knight】
 "Erika-san’s cousin also rejected Lady Hermes’ date, right? On top of that, he was seen dating another student at school." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia-knight_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria’s Knight】
 "You must harbor very bad feelings toward Lady Hermes, huh?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1446.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (I’m done for...!) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1447.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (If I refuse this Princess Election now, I’ll become hated by the largest faction in the school… there’s no way I can say no!) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I never expected them to take such a forceful approach. ]])

    MSG([[ It was true that I turned down Hermes-san’s date offer, and that I was dating another student. ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san spread these facts throughout the school to create a situation where if I refused the Princess Election, my standing would be threatened. ]])

    MSG([[ Such ruthless tactics. This was the reality of the so-called ‘Shadow Coeducation Faction’ and how serious she was. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0370.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Stop badmouthing Erika-kun. She’s just bewildered because things got unexpectedly stirred up!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0371.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Right? Erika-kun. Won't you settle this fairly in the Princess Election?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1448.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "............" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0372.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "If you don’t, there will be those who try to find the student your cousin dated… We need to correct this misunderstanding quickly." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1449.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...Ugh!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ She indirectly threatened that if I refused, she would make ‘Riko-san’s existence known.’ ]])

    MSG([[ If that happened, not only we but even Riko-san would be subjected to unreasonable slander. ]])

    MSG([[ That would be far more painful and unbearable than any humiliation I myself could suffer. ]])

    MSG([[ The person who appeared before us yesterday must have shown that they knew about Riko-san’s existence. ]])

    MSG([[ The thoroughness of this manipulation was maddening. But at this point, there was nothing I could do. ]])

    MSG([[ Suppressing my emotions desperately, I decided to comply and play along with Daria-san. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1450.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...I’m sorry for being unsettled. Now that you mention it, we did promise to hold the Princess Election." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0373.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I see, you remembered. Good, good. Our Princess Election will be a big event to close out the year." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ib")
    DARIA_PARTICLE_02(150,0,0,100,500)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0374.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "As ‘Princesses’ who love Yuriai Private Academy, let’s fight fair and square." ]])

    -- //SE：黄色い悲鳴
PLAY_SE("SEf008.wav")

    MSG([[ When I shook hands with Daria-san, yellow cheers rose from the crowd. ]])
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン（焦り）、リラ（焦り）、ヒユ（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0383.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hya!? What’s all this commotion!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0410.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san and Daria-san... so the rumors that have been circulating since this morning are true. But why did Erika-san make this decision without consulting us…?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0820.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "...She was set up, Erika was. I'll explain everything later." ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf008.wav",500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Thus, despite my wishes— ]])

    MSG([[ a showdown with Daria-san became unavoidable. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：和室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG022aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ After school, Lira-san and I visited the Japanese-style room and told Uran-san the entire situation without hiding anything. ]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）、リラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0411.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I see... So Daria-san was part of the 'Shadow Coeducation Faction,' and she was the culprit who betrayed and cornered Marika-sama." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1451.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I wanted to avoid a careless Princess Election, but I never imagined they would resort to such forceful means... I'm truly sorry." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0821.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "There's no need for Erika to apologize! It's Daria who's being way too dirty!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0822.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "She's not a senpai or anything anymore! Let's crush her head-on!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0412.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Lira-san, I understand your feelings, but it’s not good to be so disrespectful or speak so harshly." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0823.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "B-but!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0413.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "At Yuriai Private Academy, 'seniority' is absolute. Even if the other party was rude, we must not abandon tradition." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0414.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Let’s not denounce Daria-san. Instead, praise Erika-san for enduring the vile trap and dealing with it calmly as a ‘Princess.’" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1452.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-I’m not like that." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0824.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Yeah... Sorry, Erika. Maybe if we'd handled this sooner, none of this would have happened." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0825.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "We absolutely won’t let Daria-senpai have her way anymore." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0415.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "We will definitely lead Erika-san to victory." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1453.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Th-thank you very much." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Encouraged by Lira-san and Uran-san, my tears began to well up. ]])

    MSG([[ Because we once opposed each other and clashed completely, I can truly trust these two. ]])

    MSG([[ In this situation filled with suspicion, they are the most reliable allies I have. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0826.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "So, what should we do? Facing Daria-senpai as an enemy means taking on the largest faction that makes up over half the school, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1454.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I want to let everyone else know Daria-san’s true nature, but if I talk to them now, they’ll just dismiss it as a false rumor." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0416.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes… They’ll just think it’s a dirty scheme by our Erika faction. Besides, I doubt that ‘Shadow Coeducation Faction’ revealed all their secrets." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0827.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Fine by me. Whether it’s the Shadow Coeducation Faction or the <r=まげ>mage</TAG0> Coeducation Faction, I’ll crush them and their rotten souls." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0417.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Lira-san, your language is getting harsh again." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0828.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "S-sorry." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1455.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ah, it’s almost time for the boys’ club to gather." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1456.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I have to go help out at home soon, so I’ll leave the rest of the meeting to Minato. Sorry." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0418.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I hope the boys’ club members will easily become our allies." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0829.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Yeah, I think that’s probably fine." ]])

    MSG([[ … ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：男子部教室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ca")
    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0316.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "I’ll use the full might of the Rokujou family to back up Ms. Erika! It’s my duty as her fiancé!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0093.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Of course we’ll cooperate too! Yuriai is full of girls, so coeducation ruins everything!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0066.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "If boys’ status improves too much, the girls will look down on us! That’s just awful!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0073.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "I think, therefore yuri exists... but I am unnecessary there... Men are just observers... Too many would ruin it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1049.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Thank you all! I’m sure Erika will truly be happy from the bottom of her heart!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン（悲しみ）、リラ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0830.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "See?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0419.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I start to feel sad thinking about this seriously." ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san gently hugged Uran-san’s shoulder, who was so exasperated she was shedding tears. ]])

    MSG([[ Thus, all of us in Erika’s faction united as one to begin preparations for the Princess Election against Daria-san. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP04_13")
end
